input.description: adapter name [Optional] The name of the adapter that is enabled on the Peer. The default adapter name is IBMTSMActor

DELETE SCHEDULE:
This wrapper deletes schedule(s) from the database.
Sample Item Xml:
<items> <item> <operation-name>delete-schedule</operation-name> <timeout-secs>30</timeout-secs> <command-options> <domain-name>standard</domain-name> <schedule-name>schedule00002</schedule-name> <type>client</type> </command-options> </item> </items>
Elements' Description:
operation-name [Required]: the operation name. Valid values: delete-schedule.
timeout-secs [optional]: the time out second. the unit of this parameter is "second". Valid value: any integer greater than 0; Default value: 60.
command-options [Required]: within this element we provide the informations (elements) such as <domain-name>, <schedule-name>, <options> etc.
domain-name [Required]: Specifies the name of the policy domain to which the schedule belongs.
Valid values: The domain-name of targeted schedule.
schedule-name [Required]: Specifies the name of the schedule to delete.
Valid values: The shedule-name of targeted schedule, wildcard character.
Type [Optional]: Specifies to delete a client schedule.
Valid values: Client. Default value: Client.

documentation.description: This wrapper deletes schedule(s) from the database.
